short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Limits the number of daily games at chess.com to avoid addiction. Set your daily limit in the popup window and enjoy the game!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
"Chess.com Daily Games Limit" is a helpful Chrome extension designed to promote a balanced and enjoyable gaming experience on Chess.com. By setting a daily limit for games, you can better manage your time, prevent burnout, and enjoy every game of chess you play.

This extension allows you to set a daily limit on the number of chess games you initiate on Chess.com. Once you reach your daily limit, all buttons and links that initiate a new game are disabled, helping you to stick to your set limit. The limit resets at midnight every day, providing a fresh start for your chess challenges.

The extension also features a popup window where you can set your daily limit and view the number of games you've played that day. The user-friendly interface makes it easy to adjust your settings according to your needs.

"Chess.com Daily Games Limit" is a revamped version of a project found at https://github.com/standakozak/chess_games_limit. With minor updates to enhance the user experience and compatibility with the latest versions of Chrome, this extension provides a practical solution for managing your daily chess games on Chess.com.

Embrace a balanced approach to your favorite game with "Chess.com Daily Games Limit".
